page.content: Over the past{10}years the population in schools has decreased and as a result{1}of the{2}secondary schools is closing and has not taken any new{11 year olds for the last{2}years.In our block we have{4}nursery groups_all independent of the{C.C.1}Infant School {(150) 1}Junior School{(200+) 3 J.M.I. Schools{(365) 1}School for the Educational Sub Normal (_staff child ratio_){1 5/7}Secondary Schools{(830). The children in junior and infant schools are taught in mixed ability classes but are streamed into work groups at the comprehensive schools.All the schools within our area are mixed boys and girls.There are more women teachers than men because women are attracted to teaching the younger generation.A school year includes{200}teaching days split into{3}terms.
